snippet: The former Florida governor stoked speculation about his presidential ambitions by appearing on all of the Sunday morning talk shows to sell his new book on immigration.
abstract: Former Florida Gov Jeb Bush is stoking speculation about his presidential ambitions, appearing on morning talk shows in blitz that has become equal parts book promotion and damage control; he is talking up book Immigration Wars: Forging an American Solution while struggling against criticism that book reflects a reversal of his longtime position on immigration.
lead_paragraph: The former Florida governor stoked speculation about his presidential ambitions by appearing on all of the Sunday morning talk shows to sell his new book on immigration.

headline.seo: Jeb Bush Sells Immigration Book and Faces Critics
headline.main: In Talk Show Tour, Jeb Bush Promotes Book on Immigration and Replies to Critics
headline.print_headline: In Talk Show Tour, Jeb Bush Promotes Book on Immigration and Replies to Critics
